Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/69th
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland and X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 69th, Damen, 71st and Ashland near Ashland/69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland and #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 69th, Damen, 71st, Ashland and over regular route, due to street blockage near Ashland/69th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Paulina
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Ashland, 83rd, Damen, then resume their normal route on 79th, due to police activity near 79th/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Ashland, 83rd, Damen, then resume their normal route on 79th, due to police activity near 79th/Paulina.

Allow extra travel time.
